title: Worlds Finals Viewing Party Ashe Skin
body: With EVENT emailing out the codes for the ashe skin, is there any information on the ashe skins being emailed out by Village Cinemas who hosted the viewing party in Melbourne?

replies.body:
Hi xu xu bird,

You should have received a skin code email by now as the same process is applying for players who attended this cinema in Melbourne. Did you buy your ticket online or at the venue?
I bought my ticket online, and am yet to receive an email.
Right, I've seen your email come through to ocelivereports@riotgames.com so I'll follow up with Event to get you your codes.
I only received one code, but I purchased 3 tickets
Yep that would have been the email finally coming through for you but not with all the codes. I've sent an email to Event to get you all of your codes.
How long will the process take? Also i believe the viewing party was hosted by Village and not Event

It will depend on how quickly Event are able to get back to me, so we'll be working on this during business days. Event assist with the Village cinema codes as well.

But I sent your email address to Event and they could not find any purchases with the email address you sent us. Can you send us your  online ticket receipts from the email address you used to buy them?

Hi Gehirn,
back again.
I'm having an issue redeeming the code in the client. Whenever I put the code in (i tried typing and copy-pasting), I end up with the same error message, and this is for all of the codes. Imgur link attached
https://imgur.com/e0isrxX

Hi xu xu bird,

Yea the codes you received via email would have expired by now due to being from an incorrect batch.

I've now emailed you the correct codes which should still be active.

It may be related to some recent store issues, but also might not be.

If you submit a ticket to player support with the valid code and the summ name of the account you want it redeemed on they should be able to manually add the skin for you.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
They just sent them to me, thanks for everything!
